Verses: 1 indru Naan Unakku Vidhikkira Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Kattalaigalinbadiyellaam Seyya Nee Gavanamaayirukkumbadikku, Avar Saththaththirku Unmaiyaaich Sevikoduppaayaanaal, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Boomiyilulla Sagala Jaadhigalilum Unnai Menmaiyaaga Vaippaar.
2 nee Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Saththaththukkuch Sevikodukkumbodhu, Ippozhudhu Sollappadum Aaseervaadhangalellaam Unmel Vandhu Unakkuppalikkum.
3 nee Pattanaththilum Aaseervadhikkappattiruppaai; Veliyilum Aaseervadhikkappattiruppaai.
4 un Karppaththin Kaniyum, Un Nilaththin Kaniyum, Un Maadugalin Perukkamum, Un Aadugalin Mandhaigalumaagiya Un Mirugajeevangalin Palanum Aaseervadhikkappattirukkum.
5 un Koodaiyum, Maappisaikira Un Thottiyum Aaseervadhikkappattirukkum.
6 nee Varugaiyilum Aaseervadhikkappattiruppaai, Nee Pogaiyilum Aaseervadhikkappattiruppaai.

7 unakku Virodhamaai Ezhumpum Un Saththurukkalaik Karththar Unakkumunbaaga Muriya Adikkappadumbadi Oppukkoduppaar; Oru Vazhiyaai Unakku Edhiraagap Purappattu Varuvaargal; Ezhu Vazhiyaai Unakku Munbaaga Odippovaargal.
8 karththar Un Kalanjiyangalilum, Nee Kaiyidum Ellaa Velaiyilum Unakku Aaseervaadham Kattalaiyiduvaar; Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Kodukkum Dhesaththile Unnai Aaseervadhippaar.
9 nee Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Kattalaigalaik Kaikkondu, Avar Vazhigalil Nadakkumbodhu, Karththar Unakku Aanaiyittabadiye, Unnaith Thamakkup Parisuththa Janamaaga Nilaippaduththuvaar.
10 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Naamam Unakkuth Tharikkappattadhu Endru Boomiyin Janangalellaam Kandu, Unakkup Bayappaduvaargal.

11 unakkuk Koduppen Endru Karththar Un Pidhaakkalukku Aanaiyittadhesaththil, Karththar Un Karppaththin Kaniyilum, Un Mirugajeevangalin Palanilum, Un Nilaththin Kaniyilum Unakkup Paripoorana Nanmai Undaagak Kattalaiyiduvaar.

12 etrakaalaththil Un Dhesaththile Mazhai Peyyavum, Nee Kaiyittuchcheyyum Velaigalaiyellaam Aaseervadhikkavum, Karththar Unakkuth Thamadhu Nalla Pokkishasaalaiyaagiya Vaanaththaith Thirappaar; Nee Anegam Jaadhigalukkuk Kadankoduppaai. Neeyo Kadan Vaangaadhiruppaai.
13 indru Naan Ungalukku Vidhikkira Vaarththaigal Yaavaiyum Vittu Vilagi Vere Dhevargalaich Sevikkumbadi, Nee Valadhupuram Idadhupuram Saayaamal,

14 indru Naan Unakku Vidhikkira Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Kattalaigalai Kaikkollavum Avaigalinbadi Nadakkavum Avaigalukkuch Sevikoduththuvandhaal, Karththar Unnai Vaalaakkaamal Thalaiyaakkuvaar, Nee Keezhaagaamal Melaavaai.

15 indru Naan Unakku Vidhikkira Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Ellaak Karpanaigalinbadiyum Kattalaigalinbadiyum Nadakkak Gavanamaayirukkiradharku, Avar Saththaththirkuch Sevikodaadhepovaayaagil, Ippozhudhu Sollappadum Saabangalellaam Unmel Vandhu, Unakkup Palikkum.
16 nee Pattanaththilum Sabikkappattiruppaai, Veliyilum Sabikkappattiruppaai.
17 un Koodaiyum, Maappisaigira Un Thottiyum Sabikkappattirukkum.
18 un Karppaththin Kaniyum, Un Nilaththin Kaniyum, Un Maadugalin Perukkamum, Un Aadugalin Mandhaigalum Sabikkappattirukkum.
19 nee Varugaiyilum Sabikkappattiruppaai, Nee Pogaiyilum Sabikkappattiruppaai.

20 ennaivittu Vilagi Nee Seydhuvarugira Un Dhurkkiriyaigalinimiththam Seekkiraththil Kettuppoi Azhiyumattum, Nee Kaiyittuch Seygiradhellaavatrilum Karththar Unakkuch Saabaththaiyum Sanjalaththaiyum Kettaiyum Varappannuvaar.
21 nee Sudhandharikkum Dhesaththil Karththar Unnai Nirmoolamaakkumattum Kollai Noi Unnaip Pidiththukkollappannuvaar.

22 karththar Unnai Eelaiyinaalum, Kaaichchalinaalum Ushnaththinaalum, Eripandhaththinaalum, Varatchiyinaalum, Karukkaayinaalum, Vishappaniyinaalum Vaadhippaar; Nee Azhiyumattum Ivaigal Unnaip Pinthodarum.
23 un Thalaikkumelulla Vaanam Vengalamum, Unakkuk Keezhulla Boomi Irumbumaai Irukkum.
24 un Dhesaththu Mazhaiyaik Karththar Puzhudhiyum Mannumaaga Peyyappannuvaar; Nee Azhiyumattum Appadiye Vaanaththilirundhu Unmel Irangivarum.

25 un Saththurukkalukku Munbaaga Nee Muriya Adikkappadumbadi Karththar Seyvaar; Oru Vazhiyaai Avargalukku Edhiraagap Purappaduvaai, Ezhu Vazhiyaai Avargalukku Munbaaga Odippovaai; Nee Boomiyilulla Ellaa Raajyangalilum Sidharundupovaai.
26 un Pinam Aagaayaththup Paravaigalukkum Boomiyin Mirugangalukkum Iraiyaagum; Avaigalai Virattuvaarillaadhiruppaargal.
27 nee Gunamaagaadhabadi Karththar Unnai Egipthin Eripandhamaana Parukkalinaalum, Moolaviyaadhiyinaalum, Soriyinaalum, Siranginaalum Vaadhippaar.
28 karththar Unnaip Puththimayakkaththinaalum, Kuruttaattaththinaalum, Manaththikaippinaalum Vaadhippaar.

29 kurudan Andhakaaraththile Thadaviththirikiradhupola, Nee Pattappagalile Thadavikkondu Thirivaai; Un Vazhigalil Ondrum Unakku Vaaikkaadhepom; Udhaviseyvaarillaamal Nee Ennaalum Odukkappadugiravanum Parikodukkiravanumaai Iruppaai.
30 pennai Unakku Niyamippaai, Veroruvan Avaludan Sayanippaan; Veettaik Kattuvaai, Adhile Kudiyirukkamaattaai; Thiraatchaththottaththai Naattuvaai, Adhin Palanai Anubavikkamaattaai.

31 un Maadugal Un Kangalukku Munbaaga Adikkappadum, Nee Adhil Ondrum Pusippadhillai; Un Kazhudhai Unakku Munbaagak Kollaiyittuk Kondupogappattu, Unakkuth Thirumba Agappadaamalpom; Un Aadugal Un Saththurukkalukkuk Kodukkappadum; Viduvippaar Oruvarum Unakku Illaadhiruppaargal.
32 un Kumaararum Un Kumaaraththigalum Anniya Janangalukku Oppukkodukkappaduvaargal; Avargalaik Kaana Un Kangal Naadorum Paarththuppaarththup Pooththuppom; Un Kaiyil Belanillaadhirukkum.
33 un Nilaththin Kaniyaiyum, Un Pirayaasaththin Ellaap Palanaiyum Nee Ariyaadha Janangal Pusippaargal; Nee Sagalanaalum Odukkappattum Norukkappattum Iruppaai.
34 un Kankal Kaanum Kaariyangalinaale Madhimayangippovaai.
35 un Ullangaal Thodangi Uchchanthalaimattum Gunamaagaadhabadikku, Karththar Unnai Muzhangaalgalilum Thodaigalilum Kodiya Eripandhap Parukkalinaale Vaadhippaar.
36 karththar Unnaiyum, Unakkaaka Nee Erpaduththikkonda Raajaavaiyum, Neeyum Un Pidhaakkalum Ariyaadha Jaadhigalidaththukkup Pogappannuvaar; Ange Nee Maramum Kallumaana Anniya Dhevargalaich Sevippaai.
37 . Karththar Unnaik Kondupoividum Ellaa Janangalukkullum Biramippum Pazhamozhiyum Pariyaasach Chollumaavaai.
38 migundha Vidhaiyai Vayalukkuk Kondupovaai, Konjam Aruppaai; Vettukkili Adhaip Patchiththuppodum.
39 thiraatchaththottangalai Naattippayiriduvaai, Aanaalum Nee Thiraatcharasam Kudippadhum Illai, Thiraatchappazhangalaich Serppadhum Illai; Poochchi Adhaith Thindru Podum.
40 olivamarangal Un Ellaigalilengum Irukkum, Aanaalum Adhin Enneyai Nee Poosikkolvadhillai; Un Olivamaraththin Pinjugal Udhirndhupom.
41 nee Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Peruvaai, Aanaalum Avargal Unnodekooda Iraargal; Avargal Siraippattuppovaargal.
42 un Marangalellaavatraiyum Un Nilaththin Kanigalaiyum Vittil Patchiththuppodum.
43 un Naduvilirukkira Anniyan Unakku Merpattu Menmelum Uyarndhiruppaan; Nee Migavum Thaazhththappattuppovaai.
44 avan Unnidaththil Kadanpataan; Nee Avanidaththil Kadanpaduvaai; Avan Thalaiyaayiruppaan, Nee Vaalaayiruppaai.

45 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakku Vidhiththa Avarudaiya Karpanaigalaiyum Kattalaigalaiyum Kaikkollumbadi, Nee Avar Saththaththirkuch Sevikodaadhabadiyinaal, Indhach Saabangal Ellaam Unmel Vandhu, Nee Azhiyumattum Unnaiththodarndhu Pidiththu,
46 unnilum Un Sandhadhiyilum Endraikkum Adaiyaalamaagavum Arpudhamaagavum Irukkum.
47 sagalamum Paripooranamaayirukkaiyil, Nee Manamakizhchchiyodum Kalippodum Un Dhevanaagiya Karththaraich Seviyaamarponadhinimiththam,

48 sagalamum Kuraivupattu, Pattiniyodum Thaagaththodum Nirvaanaththodum, Karththar Unakku Virodhamaai Anuppum Saththurukkalaich Sevippaai; Avargal Unnai Azhiththuth Theerumattum, Iruppu Nugaththatiyai Un Kazhuththinmel Poduvaargal.
49 kizhavan Endru Mugampaaraamalum, Vaaliban Endru Irangaamalum Irukkum Kodiya Mugamulladhum,
50 unakkuth Theriyaadha Baashaiyaip Pesugiradhumaana Jaadhiyai Vegudhooraththilulla Boomiyin Kadaiyaandharaththilirundhu Karththar Unmel Kazhugu Parakkum Vegamaai Varappannuvaar.

51 nee Azhiyumattum Andha Jaadhiyaan Un Mirugajeevangalin Palanaiyum, Un Nilaththin Kaniyaiyum Pusippaan; Avan Unnai Azhiththuth Theerumattum Un Dhaaniyaththilum, Thiraatcharasaththilum, Enneyilum, Un Mandhaigalilulla Aadumaadugalilum Unakku Ondrum Meedhiyaakavaikkamaattaan.

52 un Dhesamengum Nee Nambiyirukkum Uyaramum Aranippum Madhilgal Vizhumalavum, Avan Un Vaasalgalilengum Unnai Mutrikkaippoduvaan; Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Koduththa Unnudaiya Dhesamengumulla Unnudaiya Vaasalgaldhorum Unnai Mutrikkaippoduvaan.
53 un Saththurukkal Unnai Mutrikkaippottu Nerukkungaalaththil, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Koduththa Un Karppakkaniyaana Un Puththirapuththirigalin Maamsaththaith Thinbaai.

54 un Saththurukkal Un Vaasalgalilum Unnai Mutrikkaippottu Nerukkungaalaththil, Unnidaththil Serukkum Sugaselvamumulla Manidhan Sagalaththaiyum Izhandhu, Than Illaamaiyinaale Thaan Thinnum Than Pillaigalin Maamsaththile,
55 than Sagodharanukkaagilum, Than Maarbil Irukkira Manaivikkaagilum, Thanakku Meendhirukkira Than Makkalil Oruvanukkaagilum Konjamenum Kodaadhabadi Avargalmel Vangannaayiruppaan.

56 unnidaththil Sugaselvaththinaalum Serukkinaalum Than Ullangaalaith Tharaiyinmel Vaikka Anjina Serukkum Sugaselvamumulla Sthiree Than Kaalgalin Naduve Purappatta Than Nanjukkodiyinimiththamum, Thaan Petra Pillaigalinimiththamum, Than Maarbil Irukkira Purushanmelum Than Kumaaranmelum Than Kumaaraththiyinmelum Vankannaayiruppaal;
57 un Saththurukkal Un Vaasalgalil Unnai Mutrikkaippottu Nerukkungaalaththil, Sagalamum Kuraivupaduvadhinaal, Avaigalai Ragasiyamaaith Thinnuvaan.

58 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ennum Magimaiyum Bayangaramumaana Naamaththirkup Bayappadumbadikku, Nee Indhap Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkira Indha Niyaayappiramaana Vaarththaigalinbadiyellaam Nadakkak Gavanamaayiraavittaal,
59 karththar Neengaadha Periya Vaadhaigalaalum Neengaadha Kodiya Rogangalaalum Unnaiyum Un Sandhadhiyaiyum Adhisayamaai Vaadhiththu,
60 nee Kandu Bayandha Egipthu Viyaadhigalellaam Unmel Varuvippaar; Avaigal Unnaip Patrikkollum.
61 indha Niyaayappiramaana Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyiraadha Ellaap Piniyaiyum Vaadhaiyaiyum Nee Azhiyumalavum Karththar Unmel Varappannuvaar.
62 thiratchiyile Vaanaththu Natchaththirangalaippol Irundha Neengal, Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Saththaththirkuch Sevikodaamalponadhinaal, Konjam Janamaaippoveergal.

63 karththar Ungalukku Nanmai Seyyavum Ungalaip Perugappannavum Eppadi Ungal Mel Irammiyamaayirundhaaro, Appadiye Karththar Ungalai Azhikkavum Ungalai Adhampannavum Irammiyamaayiruppaar; Neengal Sudhandharikkappogira Dhesaththilirundhu Pidungippodappaduveergal.

64 karththar Unnaip Boomiyin Oru Munaidhuvakki Boomiyin Marumunaimattum Irukkira Ellaa Janangalukkullum Sidhara Adippaar; Ange Neeyum Un Pidhaakkalum Ariyaadha Maramum Kallumaana Anniya Dhevargalaich Sevippaai.

65 andha Jaadhikalukkulle Unakku Ilaippaarudhal Iraadhu, Un Ullangaalgal Thangith Tharikka Idamum Iraadhu; Ange Karththar Unakkuth Thaththalikkira Irudhayaththaiyum, Sorndhupogira Kangalaiyum, Manachchanjalaththaiyum Koduppaar.
66 un Jeevan Unakkuch Sandhegaththil Oosalaadum; Un Jeevanaippatri Nambikkaiyillaamal Iravum Pagalum Dhigilkondiruppaai.

67 nee Bayappadum Un Irudhayaththin Digilinaalum, Un Kangal Kaanum Kaatchiyinaalum, Vidiyarkaalaththil Eppozhudhu Saayangaalam Varumo Endrum, Saayangaalaththil, Eppozhudhu Vidiyarkaalam Varumo Endrum Solluvaai.

68 inik Kaanaadhiruppaai Endru Naan Unakkuch Sonnavazhiyaai, Karththar Unnaik Kappalgalile Egiptghirkuth Thirumbak Kondupogappannuvaar; Ange Ungal Saththurukkalukku Velaikkaararaagavum Velaikkaarigalaagavum Virkappaduveergal; Ungalaik Kolvaarum Illaadhiruppaargal Endraan.
